text:
Question 151) To increase sales at the beginning of the year, a department store rescheduled the prices of its products 20% below the original price. When they arrive at the cashier, customers who have the store loyalty card are entitled to an additional 10% discount on the total value of their purchases.
A customer wants to buy a product that cost $ 50 prior to the price reschedule. It does not have the loyalty card of the store.
If this customer had the loyalty card of the store, the additional economy that would obtain when making the purchase, in reais, would be
A) 15.00.
B) 14.00.
C) 10.00.
D) 5.00.
E) 4.00.
